About this

This site is designed to be responsive, HTML5 validated, CSS validated, optimized for accessibility, with minimal JavaScript enhancements. It's also a github.io site with Jekyll blog integration.

Jan is a Web Developer with strong interests in UX and front-end design. She recently graduated as a Dev Bootcamp student in the Localhost pilot cohort in Columbus, OH. She does not actually have a mustache.

Workings

Devolio - Build your dev portfolio

April 2015, ongoing

Project Link

Project Link

DEVOLIO merges traditional resume information with GitHub/Twitter activity to quickly and easily produce an attractive, informative job search profile. The app is responsive to look great on mobile at conferences, printable to look like a traditional resume, and uses D3.js to animate real activity data from GitHub.

Built with: Ruby, Rails, Backbone.js, JavaScript / AJAX, MongoDB, d3.js, GitHub API, Twitter API, Bootstrap responsive grid (custom design and CSS otherwise), Sass, CoffeeScript

As the Team Lead, I coordinated the project, as well as heading up the UI, visual design and code, and the Backbone.js integration.

Check out my own Devolio page

Prototype Responsive Integration for Abercrombie & Fitch

Pok√©decks Flash Card Game

I was on a team that built this project over a weekend as practice with complex modeling and associations in a database. We implemented a full Agile workflow with frequent standups and peer-pairing, task tracking and review, and a team retro. I implemented the UI as well as vertical slices for user CRUD and some game play.

Built with: Ruby, Rails, CSS

See it on GitHub
